#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int dp[100005];
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    int ans = 0;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        int n;
        cin >> s >> n;
        if(s=="found")
            dp[n] = ans;
        else if(dp[n]>=0)
        {
            ans = max(ans,dp[n]+n);
            dp[n] = -1;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
return 0;
}
